title: Tags do not work in BSD
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
I've several test file with the tag

// +build !foo

and anothers with

// +build foo

and when I use go test -tags foo, it does not works because the file with tag
"!foo" is run anyway

It fails in BSD systems; checked in FreeBSD and OpenBSD.

go version weekly.2012-03-27 +9a3c164b3231
amd64
